participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, Emily finds joy in helping others and values close relationships with her friends.
participant_1.background: I can be myself at work because my coworkers are all really accepting. I like horseback riding. I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax. I like to eat food from my parents' home country. Summer is my favorite season.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake enjoys trying new things and values the support of his family and friends.
participant_2.background: I took up brewing my own beer and became a regular at local car shows with my Ford F-150. My family is very supportive and understands my condition. Magic Mike is my favorite movie. I want to learn Swedish so I can be more comfortable in Sweden. Pink is my favorite color.

content.text: hey there! What's up?
hey there! Not much, just enjoying my evening. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm just getting ready for work
Oh, what do you do for work?
I work as a nurse at a local hospital
Oh cool! That's a great job. I used to work in healthcare, but I had to change careers because of my health
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of health condition do you have?
I have lupus, but I'm doing well now that I've changed careers
That's great to hear! I'm glad you're doing well
Thanks! So what's your favorite thing about your job?
I love helping people, and I love the feeling of making a difference in someone's life
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great nurse
Thanks! I try my best
Well, I'm sure you're doing a great job. What's your favorite season?
My favorite season is summer. I love the warm weather and the sunshine
That's a great choice! Summer is my favorite season too. I love spending time outdoors
Me too! I love going to the beach and swimming
I love going to the beach too! I also love going hiking and camping
Oh, I love hiking and camping too! We should go camping sometime
That would be fun! I'd love to go camping with you
Great! We should make plans soon
Sounds good! I'm free this weekend if you are
I'm free this weekend too! Let's go camping!
Awesome! I'll start planning
Great! I can't wai
